column4: ERROR :Warning: Permission problem: Can't read/write from/to /var/lib/bitlbee/. <--- How do I fix this problem?
in terminal gksu nautilus then go to the folder right click and set permissions
hit the arrow key all the way up
it will take you to your computers files
just press it like 5 times xP
